headline: COLUMBUS Craft Meats Expands Deli Portfolio with First Standalone Pepperoni Product
summary: COLUMBUS Craft Meats, a leading brand in premium salumi, has launched its first standalone pepperoni deli product: COLUMBUS Uncured Pepperoni. A brand rooted in Italian American tradition, the...
